question.body: Which of the following is not a deep vein of the pelvis and lower limb?

response.feedback: Incorrect. The Dorsalis pedis vein is a deep vein that drains the feet.
Incorrect. The Popliteal vein is a deep vein that drains the knee joint.
Correct. The great saphenous vein runs along the medial side of the leg and is a superficial vein.
Incorrect. The femoral vein is a deep vein that drains the deep thigh muscles and the femur.
